sources.title: The Happy Butterfly (1934)
sources.description: Scrappy is butterfly hunting, and captures a singing butterfly, who turns out to have a magic ring, which Oopie grabs. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-happy-butterfly-1934/

metadata.Plot: There's this butterfly, see. And the butterfly sings a song that consists of two lines, using the amazing rhyme of "butterfly" and "flutter by"and various iterations of "la la la". Scrappy is butterfly hunting, and captures the butterfly, who turns out to have a magic ing, which Oopie grabs.It doesn't look like much effort went into this cartoon, which includes at least three repeated sequences. This means they didn't put much money into it either.
